Home Page¶

The Home Page is the root page of Memory Palaces. In other words, it is the page the user arrives at when they visit the Memory Palaces web site.

Features/Functions¶

  • Image Slider

This page is used as a greeting page for the site and does not offer much content besides the image slider at the center.
